column4: I ran the following command in a terminal and now the system won't boot any idea how to correct it?  sudo sh -c 'echo "allow-guest=false" >> /etc/lightdm/lightdm.conf'
Actually it will boot but it get's to "UBUNTU" then the screen goes black...
use a live cd and edit the lightdm.conf and remove that added line
how do I edit lightdm.conf once I boot to the cd?
